philosophy.label: Development Philosophy
philosophy.title: Coexist with AI, Don't Depend on It
philosophy.description: I believe in empowering developers to work alongside AI, not blindly accept its suggestions. Through strategic use of Cursor's features, we can accelerate development while maintaining code quality and understanding. My approach focuses on teaching developers to leverage AI as a powerful tool while keeping their critical thinking and expertise at the forefront.

experience.sectionDescription: Building impactful solutions across diverse industries and technologies

achievements: Developed cloud-based solutions using .NET & NodeJS + ReactJS

Delivered project on time and within budget
Built medical software for patient vital sign analysis
Developed microservices for Airbnb and Hotel Booking integrations
Developed enterprise software in JavaScript and .NET
Created and managed .NET applications and ReactJS websites
Improved deployment pipeline, reducing release time by 30%

surveys.title: Active Surveys

hackathon-01.title: Hackathon 01
hackathon-01.description: Build innovative products with emerging technologies and share your moments with the team.

theme.title: The Challenge: Save Time
theme.subtitle: Build solutions that help people optimize their most valuable resource
theme.description: Time is the most valuable thing we have and what we must learn to optimize the most. Your challenge today is to develop a solution that saves time in any area of daily life.
theme.clarification: Think broadly about time-saving: it could be personal productivity, work efficiency, daily routines, administrative tasks, or any repetitive process that consumes time. The solution doesn't need to be completeâ€”focus on the core idea and how AI/Cursor helped you develop it quickly.

automation.title: Workflow Automation
automation.description: Tools that automate repetitive tasks in work or studiesâ€”think data entry, file organization, email management, or report generation

optimization.title: Routine Optimizer
optimization.description: Apps that optimize daily routinesâ€”morning preparation, meal planning, commute coordination, or task scheduling

assistant.title: Smart Assistants
assistant.description: Intelligent assistants that streamline processesâ€”form filling, appointment booking, decision-making helpers, or information aggregators

theme.keyPoint: Remember: The goal is not to build a complete product, but to demonstrate a creative approach to solving a time-saving problem using Cursor effectively.

keynote.title: Keynotes & Brunch
keynote.description: Cursor overview and networking over brunch

start.title: Building Time Starts
start.description: Begin working on your time-saving solution

evaluation.title: Prizes & Recognition
evaluation.subtitle: Top 3 teams win Cursor credits
evaluation.description: At the end of the event, all participants will vote for their favorite solutions. The top 3 projects with the most votes win Cursor credits!
evaluation.prize: Cursor credits for the top 3 winning teams

guidelines.title: How Voting Works
guidelines.subtitle: Participants decide the winners through group approval

votingProcess.title: Voting Process
votingProcess.description: After the building phase ends, each team will present their solution. All participants will then vote for their favorite projects to determine the winners.

presentations.title: 2-Minute Pitches
presentations.description: Each team has exactly 2 minutes to pitch their solution and demo what they built

voting.title: Participant Voting
voting.description: All participants vote for their favorite solutions (you can't vote for your own team)

winners.title: Top 3 Teams Win
winners.description: The 3 teams with the most votes receive Cursor credits

guidelines.criteriaImportant: Important: Solution completeness is NOT the priority. We value creative approach and effective use of Cursor over having a finished product!

creativity.title: Creative Approach & Innovation
creativity.description: How creative and innovative is your solution? Did you think outside the box?

cursorUsage.title: Effective Use of Cursor & AI
cursorUsage.description: How well did you leverage Cursor and AI tools to accelerate your development?

impact.title: Time-Saving Potential
impact.description: How effectively could this solution save time if fully developed?

presentation.title: Clear Communication
presentation.description: How well did you explain your idea and demonstrate your progress?

cta.title: Community
cta.description: Connect with other participants in our WhatsApp community for questions, team formation, and ongoing collaboration.
cta.community: Share ideas and connect with others

meta.title: Hackathon 01 - October 4, 2025
meta.description: Join us for an experimental 2-hour AI-powered hackathon in El Salvador. Build solutions that save time using Cursor and emerging technologies.
